data.title: "Genetique de la cellule bacterienne." Reprint from Les Prix Nobel en 1965. NOBEL LECTURE. SIGNED BY FRANÇOIS JACOB. by JACOB, François: Very Good Soft cover (1965) 1st Edition, Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - 1st Edition - Soft cover - 1965 - Condition: Very Good - 21 pp. Original wrappers. Very Good. First Edition. SIGNED BY FRANÇOIS JACOB (see photo). Offprint of François Jacob's Nobel Lecture delivered December 11, 1965. The Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine in 1965 was awarded jointly to François Jacob, André Lwoff and Jacques Monod "for their discoveries concerning genetic control of enzyme and virus synthesis." - "Genetique de la cellule bacterienne." Reprint from Les Prix Nobel en 1965. NOBEL LECTURE. SIGNED BY FRANÇOIS JACOB.
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Payment may be made directly to Scientia Books by check or money order in US$, or

by credit card through the ABE shopping basket. I do not accept credit cards

directly.

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or valuable, I will contact you to let you know an extra shipping charge is being requested.
